name: Kobold Malice
flavor: At the start of any kobolds's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: Up to 3 kobolds make a free strike, swaps positions with an adjacent kobold, and then that kobold makes a free strike.
Two kobolds take their turns in a row.
Until the end of the round, all kobolds with Shield? Shield! impose an additional bane on incoming strikes and abilities.
